uxui.name: Medicaid Provider Enrollment - Final Design
uxui.altText: Black and white wireframe for Medicaid provider enrollment through multiple inputs on tabbed screens.
uxui.briefDescription: Form for online Medicaid provider enrollment
uxui.longDescription: Would-be Medicaid providers offer detailed information to expedite the enrollment process.

uxui.name: Medicaid Provider Enrollment - Wireframe
uxui.altText: Black and white wireframe for Medicaid provider enrollment through multiple inputs on tabbed screens.
uxui.briefDescription: Form for online Medicaid provider enrollment
uxui.longDescription: Would-be Medicaid providers offer detailed information to expedite the enrollment process.

uxui.name: Medicaid Provider Enrollment - Whiteboard
uxui.altText: Photographic documentation of whiteboard sketches of the Medicaid provider enrollment process
uxui.briefDescription: Sketches of the provider enrollment process
uxui.longDescription: From the initial discovery meeting showing enrollment flow from the view of caseworkers, members and providers.

uxui.name: Medicaid Provider Address Validation
uxui.altText: Input screen for Medicaid Providers to validate their postal address as part of the application to become a new provider.
uxui.briefDescription: Postal address validation for new providers
uxui.longDescription: Confirms the user has provided all necessary address information and suggest alternatives.

uxui.name: Errors Summary - Wireframe
uxui.altText: Grayscale wireframe of a simple dashboard summarizing error incurred processing Medicaid provider applications.
uxui.longDescription: Allows leadership to see a summary of errors in processing Medicaid provider applications. Processed nightly, searchable by date.

uxui.name: Medicaid Eligibility Review Form
uxui.altText: Full color design of an application to assist caseworkers assessing Medicaid eligibility.
uxui.briefDescription: Tool for reviewing and documenting Medicaid applications
uxui.longDescription: Caseworkers may review and provide feedback and detail on individual applications, as well as view their overall metrics.

uxui.name: SCDHHS Email Template
uxui.altText: Email template for the South Carolina Department of Health and Human services for the service GovDelivery.
uxui.longDescription: Standardization of email to match the agencyâ€™s style guide and branding.

uxui.name: Medicaid Enterprise Services - Wireframe
uxui.altText: Black and white wireframe for an interface to allow enterprise level directors and caseworkers to review data from nightly report processing
uxui.longDescription: Reports processed nightly. Directors view aggregate data while caseworkers may examine individual cases.

uxui.name: NPI Validation
uxui.altText: Basic interface with a dropdown and text field to determine if a National Provider Identifier is valid or not
uxui.briefDescription: Application for validating National Provider Identifier numbers
uxui.longDescription: Medicaid providers are assigned a unique NPI. Entering a valid NPI returns a JSON object with all data associated with the number.

uxui.name: Operational Data Store Search - Wireframe
uxui.altText: Black and white wireframe for an application to allow caseworkers to resolve conflicts in data related to a single client across multiple data stores
uxui.longDescription: Application to facilitate caseworkers resolving conflicts in data for a single client across multiple systems.

uxui.name: Alert Message Admin Tool
uxui.altText: Application for administrators to create, edit and search alerts to Medicaid providers
uxui.briefDescription: Create, edit and search alerts to providers
uxui.longDescription: Central hub of DHHS administrators to generate and edit alerts to Medicaid providers within the system.

uxui.name: SCDHHS Portal Landing Page
uxui.altText: Application for administrators to create, edit and search alerts to Medicaid providers
uxui.briefDescription: Landing page for Medicaid in South Carolina
uxui.longDescription: Centralized resources for Medicaid healthcare providers, members and employees.
